## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e47c000bd16e968d0cf79cedeb817099f703aeaa335771981d0c5a9f43982b73)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'poptoken-builder-node' @ 99.3.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
